general: Today, the Moon in Virgo may make you feel imbalances in your daily life. It is important to evaluate the amount of digital content you consume. Take a moment to compare your recreational screen time to the energy you invest in your social relationships and passions. Once you identify these imbalances, it will be easier to redirect your attention towards enriching activities. Embrace this period to break unhealthy habits, especially regarding your use of digital devices.
love: Take the time to truly connect with your partner, free from digital distractions.
work: Reassess your professional priorities and set healthy boundaries to avoid information overload.
health: Dedicate time to physical activities that take you away from screens, such as a walk outdoors.
advice: Sort through your habits for better balance.
